    public abstract class OITank
extends java.lang.Object
implements OIUnidirectional
    A tank-style dual joystick OI.

        public double[] getLeftRightOutput()
        The output to be given to the left and right sides of the drive.
        Specified by:
        getLeftRightOutput in interface OIUnidirectional
        Returns:
        An array of length 2, where the 1st element is the output for the left and the second for the right, both from [-1, 1].
